name: RUN FOR YOUR LIFE! (Piotrek4)
description:
This is a simple game where you have to go though 10 hard levels. Every time you pass a level, your life WONT be refilled. However, you have a power to teleport!! Simply press E to throw your life away :) if it hits something you will be teleported. So try to aim :D

Thanks to RadioactiveWabbit for gameplay music track for this game!
